replies.body: He is pretty fun. From his personality to his ult. My only real complaint is that he doesn’t feel durable until level 13, with no way to personally increase his durability (like a shield or DR) in fights.

its a really weird thing that they keep doing to tanks, multiple champions like Galio, Sejuani and Ornn they just double down on giving them % hp damage and not really giving their kit anything that implies tankiness at all, they're just bruisers with crap build paths.

The % HP damage is to help them trade and is reduced easily by buying resistances.  If fighters were actually building resistances like they should (but the meta makes it ok for them not to) then they'd be reduced.  

Ornn and Sejuani are pretty much the only tanks who have only passive ways to increase their durability (both in their passives oddly enough).  Every other tank has some sort of heal, shield, or active resistance boost.
ornn stole poppys passive tho o.o
Ornn lost a shield, they gave him something. It’s not stealing if the original still has it.
Ornn feels pretty tanky to me. Out damages me and out sustains in early laning.

He needs an ohmwrecker upgrade. +300 hp +50 armor. Should fix his early game up by allowing him easy access to that health Regen. He loves all the ohmwrecker stats, just needs an excuse to build it.

 This would be a bit better than the Sunfire cape upgrade stats. +10 armor -25 life. It'd also give ohm a place in the game again. Right now it's the least built item and left there because it was added as part of a competition someone won. It should be fixed.

He's probably the only champion it's really good on but he can't even buy it because it won't work with his passive. He's one of those almost there but not quite champions, and I feel like something this small would help him in just the right way. That and maybe jg item upgrade.
